snippet: A film has stirred up a dispute in Washington about the information that the filmmakers received from the Central Intelligence Agency and about the timing of the movie’s release.
abstract: Mark Boal and Kathryn Bigelow's still-untitled movie about the hunt for Osama bin Laden stirs up a dispute in Washington over classified information that the filmmakers received from the Central Intelligence Agency and the timing of the movie’s release during the 2012 election.
lead_paragraph: A film has stirred up a dispute in Washington about the information that the filmmakers received from the Central Intelligence Agency and about the timing of the movie’s release.

headline.seo: Film on Bin Laden Hunt Leads to Pentagon Investigation
headline.main: Film About the Hunt for Bin Laden Leads to a Pentagon Investigation
headline.print_headline: Film About the Hunt for Bin Laden Leads to a Pentagon Investigation
